definition: affording change (especially in social status), sculpture suspended in midair whose delicately balanced parts can be set in motion by air currents
details:
adjective
- affording change (especially in social status)
= synonyms: fluid
- capable of changing quickly from one state or condition to another
= example: capable of changing quickly from one state or condition to another
- moving or capable of moving readily (especially from place to place)
= example: moving or capable of moving readily (especially from place to place)
- having transportation available
- migratory
= example: migratory
= synonyms: wandering, nomadic, peregrine, roving
noun
- sculpture suspended in midair whose delicately balanced parts can be set in motion by air currents
